lyrics:
Everywhere I look the sun is shinning
But it's always raining here inside
I can see you really had a hold on me
It's a mean old love with a flame that never dies

Won't you tell me why
I can't say goodbye

Everywhere I go you're in my shadow
When I turn around there's no one there
And it's a real bad sign I'm walking on real thin line
A fool in love with a fool that never cared

So,won't you tell me why
I can't say goodbye
Won't you tell me why

Ask anyone you know and they'll say "Loves fades away"
But this heart's cryin' just like yesterday

And it's a real bad sign I'm walking on a real thin line
A fool in love with a fool that never cared

So won't you tell me why
I can't say goodbye

Won't you tell me why
I can't say goodbye
